item.title: SonarQube with JaCoCo in multi-module Maven project
item.description: How to set up a SonarQube code analysis using the Sonar Maven Plugin including code coverage with the JaCoCo Maven plugin.

item.title: Breaking your build on SonarQube quality gate failure
item.description: A summary on my QAlabs project for a Maven plugin and a standalone application to break the build on SonarQube quality gate failure
